meanings.sent1: The interlocal bus service connects different neighborhoods in the city.
meanings.sent2: The interlocal road links the two towns together for easy travel.
meanings.sent3: The interlocal picnic brought people from various areas for a fun day out.
meanings.sent4: The interlocal bridges symbolize the unity between the neighboring regions.
meanings.sent5: The interlocal train system makes it convenient to commute between towns.

meanings.definition: A cooperative agreement between local governments
meanings.sent1: The interlocal between the cities helped them share resources efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The interlocal allowed the towns to collaborate on waste management.
meanings.sent3: The interlocal meeting turned into a friendly competition between mayors.
meanings.sent4: The interlocal handshake sealed the deal between the municipalities.
meanings.sent5: The interlocal partnership improved services for all residents involved.
